name: DayNumber
0:
”Alexa ask day number for today's number”
”Alexa get the number from day number”
”Alexa open day number”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: day number
des: There may be times when we want to know the day number in the year. Many calendars do not give the day number. Alexa will give you the day and week number for just asking.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
